Он шел, без остановки, шел по своему пути, три года спустя он перестал оставлять следы, на четвертом году он мог ходить по воде, на пятый год он ходил по воздуху, он шел и сметал всех врагов со своего пути, не погода, ни огонь, ни вода не могли его остановить, кроме одного, конца пути, неужели весь его путь так легко закончится, что же будет после того самого конца?

altTitles.ja: 秘め婿

description.en: Shiki and Yamato are childhood friends, living in a village in Yamatai. Yamato, who always protects Shiki from bullies, has a personality as radiant as the sun. Furthermore, he unknowingly trifles with Shiki's heart with his bright nature. “My heart beats so loud when I’m next to Yamato…” When Shiki realizes his feelings toward Yamato, Yamato also notices himself falling for Shiki’s beautiful crimson eyes. However, fate tears the two apart, and they never see each other again. After ten years of holding onto his feelings for Shiki, Yamato reunites with a certain “man”…

title.en: Tensei Shitekara 40-nen. Sorosoro, Ojisan mo Koi ga Shitai. Nidome no Jinsei wa Harem Route?!

altTitles.ja: 転生してから４０年。そろそろ、おじさんも恋がしたい。　二度目の人生はハーレムルート!?

altTitles.en: It's been 40 years since I was reincarnated. It's time for this uncle to fall in love.

altTitles.ru: Прошло 40 лет с тех пор, как я перевоплотился. Пришло время этому дяде влюбиться.

description.en: Forty years have passed since his reincarnation, and the guild leader, Girold, has been working diligently. Looking back on his life, he realizes that he hasn't been able to get married, so he tries his best to get a girlfriend, but there is no luck. He thinks he's not popular, but the girls around him are trying to approach him… The harem love comedy from "Shosetsuka ni Narou" begins! (DeepL)

The "Ha Jaeyoung" whom Seou had a crush on in high school has died. Seou meets the deceased Ha Jaeyoung in a dream, and as the past is reenacted in the dream, Seou tries to change it to save him. Meanwhile, the death of another Ha Jaeyoung gets entangled, complicating the present. Before this dream that transcends time ends, can Seou save both Ha Jaeyoungs?
description.ko:
고등학생 때 짝사랑했던 '하재영'이 죽었다.
'서우'는 꿈에서 죽은 '하재영'을 만나고, 꿈에서 과거가 재현되자 그를 살리기 위해 과거를 바꾸려 한다.
한편, 또 다른 '하재영'의 죽음까지 엮이면서 현재는 복잡하게 변해가는데..
시간을 넘나드는 이 꿈이 끝나기 전, '서우'는 두 '하재영'을 모두 살릴 수 있을까?

title.en: A Barbarian Was Admitted to the Academy

altTitles.ja: アカデミーにオランケが入学した

description.en:
Lee Soo-jin, a college student who loved playing a role-playing game called “Academy of Magic”.

One day, he wakes up in the body of Rina, a secondary character in the game who was a barbarian warrior from a savage tribe. He discovers that Rina was destined to come to a bad end, being captured and tortured by the evil empress.

She decides to escape this fate and enroll in the magic academy, where she meets several characters from the game, including the crown prince, the black knight, the white wizard and the empress herself.

One day at school, the class teacher turns into a "huge spherical insect beetle" and kills half the students. The Black Ant that appeared at that moment, which was able to save the rest of the students, becomes the main object of attention of the media and social networks, and its existence is no longer a mere legend of the level of urban ghost stories.
Eventually the government decides to infiltrate a team of Bug Reapers, insector-catchers on a secret mission and, according to survivors, on the heels of the Black Ant. Black Ant's personality is an ordinary high school student, Ka Mi-sun, who has an anthill in his body. So that the insects living in it do not eat it, the guy has to become an enemy of the insects and reluctantly fight.

altTitles.ja: カジノグイ

description.en:
Gen Suzuki, a young man who grew up in an orphanage, is trying to live an honest life.  
But when the cruel reality of the 10 million yen debt from her sister hits him, he decides to rob a Dark Casino.  
What awaits him is the baptism of the underworld!

Dongmi Lin—Nickname “Control Freak”, a college student who likes to control other people. One day he moves into a new dorm and meets an uncontrollable dorm mate, and f****d with him. His brain starts to uncontrollably generate fantasies…

The story is set in contemporary South Korea. Some 30 years ago, unidentified creatures appeared out of nowhere and have attacked people. They have caused massive destruction wherever they go. These monsters are called "Trouble", and due to them the world has fallen into chaos. Along with the first appearance of the "Troubles", some number of humans were born with or acquired supernatural abilities. These mutants called "Trace" are the only ones who can fight off the "Trouble". The "Trace" are also considered freaks and are generally shunned by the community, because some of them misused the powers for their own interest.  
  
The story starts soon after the end of season 1. Captain of National Investigation Service Han Si Hyun tries to start a research program of communicating with Troubles, but gets rejected again and again. While meeting with a friend, who is helping him in his search for Kim Yoon-Sung (Mr. Beggar), he gets the absurd idea of starting research on his own.

altTitles.fr: Notes de ma réincarnation dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界転生騒動記

altTitles.en: Record of My Reincarnation in Another World

description.en:
In the Kingdom of Mauricia, Bard Cornelius has fallen ill, and the reason is because two different people have been reborn into his body.

He has his own personality as "Bard," and there are two other personalities too! A miserly feudal warlord, Sadatoshi Okasanai, and a nerdy high school student, Masaharu Oka, who has a fetish for animal ears!

Three souls as one; he is able to fight, start his own business and manage the lands with such competence as if he's using cheat codes...! 

A fun isekai fantasy!

Dungeons and monsters suddenly appear and the world falls into chaos. Kim Ki-Bong, an ordinary young part-timer, has been sucked up into an awakening dimension for 3000 years to train his powers.

When he makes his return to reality, he is a max-leveled player who only has one wish - to reconcile with his loved ones. 10 years have passed in the real world during his absence.

How will Ki-Bong be able to find his place in the world with his new limit-breaking abilities?

altTitles.zh: 我转生成为了女主角而基友却成为了勇者

altTitles.zh-ro: Khi chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác, tôi trở thành nữ hiệp và cậu ta trở thành một anh hùng

altTitles.id: Ketika Gue Bereinkarnasi di Dunia Lain, Gue Jadi Heroine dan Dia Heronya

description.de: Keito Azumi, ein ganz gewöhnlicher Oberschüler, wurde als Heldin in eine andere Welt aufgewacht nachdem in einem Unfall gestorben ist. Das schlimmste daran ist: Sein bester Freund wurde der Held!
description.en: Keito Azumi, an ordinary high school boy, was reincarnated as the heroine in a different world when he woke up in an accident! The worst thing about this is that his best friend became the hero!
description.id: Keito Azumi, bocah sekolah menengah biasa, bereinkarnasi sebagai heroine di dunia yang berbeda ketika dia terbangun dalam suatu kecelakaan! Hal terburuk tentang ini adalah sahabatnya menjadi pahlawan!

altTitles.ja: かみながしじま ～輪廻の巫女～

description.en: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!
description.ru: Старшеклассница Аманэ Мико - известная Мико в своем родном городе. Однажды она попадает в странное дорожно-транспортное происшествие и обнаруживает, что просыпается в мире, наполненном гротескно выглядящими монстрами, бродящими вокруг...! Постоянный страх нападения этих монстров! Однако, чтобы разгадать тайны этого мира, Мико продвигается сквозь этот мир отчаяния. Сотрудничая с другими выжившими девушками, чтобы сбежать с этого уединенного острова в далеком море в этом паническом хорроре!

altTitles.en: Another Happy Day for the Villainess

altTitles.fa: بانوی شرور امروز شاد و شنگوله

altTitles.ja: 悪女は今日も楽しい

altTitles.my: အမွှေစိန်ဗီလိန်မလေးရဲ့ကံတရား

altTitles.th: นางร้ายสายเชิด

altTitles.mn: Хорон санаатан өнөөдөр ч баяртай байна

altTitles.id: Today the Villainess Has Fun Again

description.en:
My friend stole my boyfriend and then dared to hand me a wedding invitation with a smile? Ha! I had a blast enjoying my revenge and came home and fell asleep but...when I woke up I was in the body of the Villainess of a Romance Fantasy novel who has everything: appearance, assets, and intelligence. The only thing this girl lacked was the insight to judge a man. Throw the bastard Prince away to the main female lead and let us just enjoy the luxury of power and money!

---
From growing up in a dysfunctional family to being cheated on, Sojin never had it easy. So after waking up in the body of villainess Reilynn Candmion, daughter of the empire’s wealthiest duke, all she wants is to revel in her riches. But something feels amiss when the story’s heroine, Iris, constantly starts fights with her — from stealing her dress to seducing her fiancé. Reilynn wants no drama, but Iris and her four love interests won’t leave her alone! Can’t a girl just wanna have fun?
description.fa: یه روز زنی که به عنوان یکی زنان شهری قدرتمند و زیبا شناخته میشد درباره ازدواج دوست پسر سابقش شنید. از زندگی سیر شد و خواب به خواب شد "چراااا من شرور شدم؟" اون نقش یک بانوی شرور رو بازی می کرد که نامزد خودشو از دست داده و شخصیت اصلی زنو آزار میداد. هرچند هیچ چیز بدی درمورد اون وجود نداره چون این شرور همه چی داره! اما اولین کاری که باید انجام بده اینکه که از نامزد اشغال و دختر بازش بخواد که جدا بشن! "بیا از هم جداشیم." "…چی؟" "چیه؟فکر نمیکنی یکم بی انصافیه؟ " تو فکر می کنی منصفانه‌ست که از من بخوای وقتی با دختری دیگه ای قرار میزاری باهات ازدواج کنم؟

description.en: UPDATES EVERY THURSDAY — Lose your mind one way or another. It’s 2070 on a planet not so far off from Earth. After a major earthquake, radioactive material has overcome almost all the land. Inhabitants must now find a way to live with the immensely destructive waste. Will you join the army, traffic for the cartel, or overwork yourself to death?

Murong Qian, a fortune teller, foresees a disaster threatening his family. In a bid to save them, he aims to seduce the prince and gain power, only to discover that Prince He Cangxiao has a deadly fear of men. Yet, caught in the intoxicating allure of desire’s flowers, they share a night of passion. Now, torn between fear and lust, He Cangxiao can't stop craving Murong Qian. A whirlwind of pleasure ensues, engulfing them for a thousand and one nights!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official English](https://yaoi.kijimam.space/studio/?product=ebook1001-nights-series)

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

description.en:
"Beauty cannot be real power."

Cayena, the Imperial Princess, was known as the most beautiful woman in the Empire. She was a woman who knew nothing but evil and luxury. However, she was destined for ruin: she would be used as a chess piece by her younger brother to secure his throne and killed by her crazy husband.

"I'll make you the emperor."

"…Sister, you're going to make me the emperor?"

"In exchange, give me freedom."

She had to change things before she became *that* Cayena.

---
I woke up as Kayena Hill, the novel’s villainess, praised as the greatest beauty in the empire. Who knew that her story would catch my attention because I was her in my past life? Destined for terrible ends, I’ve died twice—but I refuse to die a third time as a pawn in someone else’s scheme. I’m no longer the vain and naïve princess. Now that I know how the story will unfold, I’ll turn the tables around and have everyone dancing to my tune. This time, I’ll be the one pulling the strings.

---

description.ru:
Принцесса Каена, прославившаяся своей красотой на всю Империю, не ведает ничего, кроме алчности и злобы. Долгое время она пыталась избавиться от своего младшего брата-тирана, но встретила смерть от руки своего мужа.
— Я помогу тебе стать Императором.
— Сестра… Вы обо мне?..
— Но в обмен… ты подаришь мне свободу.
До того, как «я» стану принцессой Каеной.

帝国的皇女，卡也娜，被誉为帝国最漂亮的女人。 她也是一个除了邪恶与奢侈以外一无所知的女人。 但是，她注定会灭亡：她的弟弟用她作为棋子来保住自己的王位，而最终卡也娜也会被自己疯狂的丈夫杀死。 “我会让你成为皇帝。” “……姐姐，您是指我吗？” “作为交换，请给我自由。” 她必须在成为那个卡也娜之前扭转局面。

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: 死に戻り令嬢のルチェッタ

altTitles.zh: 死而復生的露琪塔大小姐

altTitles.en: Lady Lucetta Came Back to Life

description.en:
(From Mangaupdates)

Lucetta, a daughter of a fallen family, is married to Kyle, a rich man who is after a title, in order to pay off her family's debts.
After a loveless marriage full of fights, she gets caught up in an attack targeting Kyle and dies... but she has returned to her life right after the engagement!
He decides to live happily in this life if he has come back to death.
In order to pay off her debts, Lucetta hides her face and begins to work as a fortune teller, taking advantage of her knowledge of the future.
However, Kyle shows up at to ask for advice about his love life with her.
Is it true that he has been in love with me for a long time?

Kyle wants to dote on her and Lucetta wants to break off their engagement, and the two tsundere's break off their engagement love comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー娘
帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

description.en:
The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”

The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Affection

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Love
The Villainess Is Shy to Be Loved

altTitles.ja: 悪役なのに愛されすぎています

altTitles.th: สาวน้อยตัวร้ายชักรู้สึกเขินอายที่ได้รับความรัก

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !

description.en:
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

_Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name,
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)_

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

description.en:
I don't trust any human being.  
  
An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.  
  
Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

description.en:
The strongest and oldest dragon who had lived through eternity allowed himself to be killed by Hero. Just as he prepared for eternal sleep, he realized himself reborn as Dran, a villager in the frontier.

Working the field, hunting forest animal, and having a warm life has filled his heart with joy he never experienced in his whole dragon life.

One day, when he's patroling the forest near his village, he encountered a powerful demon army

description.es:
El Dragón más antiguo y poderoso del mundo se cansó de su vida, así que elige morir cuando los héroes vengan por él. Pero sucede un giro inesperado después de su muerte, fue reencarnado como un humano. Él en su alivio, decide vivir una vida como un humano en todo su esplendor, y recupera su voluntad de vivir… pero debido a su gran cantidad de poder mágico, él resulta envuelto en muchos problemas, así que su misión es acabar con todo lo que moleste su tranquilidad, y así disfrutar de su nueva vida con los amigos que encuentra en el camino.  


---

description.en:
Dorothea Milanaire, who was once the tyrant of the Ubera Empire, wound up being hated by the one she loved and was executed. However... after she opened her eyes, she found herself back in her childhood?! Believing this to be her chance, she resolved to live virtuously in this life. Can she repent her past life as a tyrant and live virtuously in her new life...?!

---

description.ko:
폭군님은 갱생 중! 

제국 우베라의 폭군이었던 도로테아 밀라네어. 

눈앞의 모든 것을 제거하며, 빼앗고 탐욕스럽게 먹어 치우는 '악'이었던 그녀는 
결국 사랑하는 사람에게 미움받고 처형을 당하고 만다. 

그런데... 눈을 뜨니 어린 시절로 되돌아왔다?!  

혹시 이건 악과 후회로 얼룩진 인생을 되돌릴 수 있는 기회가 아닐까? 

이번 생의 목표는 착하게 사는 것. 
과연 도로테아는 폭군이었던 과거를 청산하고 새로운 삶에서 착하게 살아갈 수 있을까...?! 

폭군님의 인생을 건 갱생이 시작된다!

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

description.uk:
Доротея Міланір - тиранка імперії Убера, яка була ненависна тому, кого кохала, хоча все своє існування відчайдушно прохала про взаємну любов. Однак... Розплющивши очі, героїня розуміє, що повернулася в дитинство. "Здається, це мій шанс!". Вона ставить собі за мету прожити гідне життя. Чи вдасться їй позбутися своєї минулої тиранічної суті та нарешті жити щасливо?

---

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

description.en:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?
description.hu:
Nyúl alakváltó voltam, aki még emberré sem tudott átalakulni a nagykorúság ceremóniáján. A családom azt mondta, hogy csak fél éves vagyok, és egy kosárba helyeztek..."Sírsz? Gyerünk, sírj többet!" Aztán fel vett egy fekete párduc, akinek személyisége nem a legjobb. "Hiányzik belőled a harci szellem. Holnapután megeszlek, szóval jobb lesz, ha tovább próbálkozol. " A vad állat szemei csillogtak miközben remegő arcomat bámulta. "Milyen izgalmas." Anya, szerintem ő őrült! Túlélni egy őrült fekete párducot..."A vadállatok birtoklóak, bármi is legyen az." ....Ez lehetséges?

---

description.id:
Aku adalah pengubah bentuk kelinci yang bahkan tidak bisa berubah menjadi manusia dengan upacara kedewasaanku. Keluarga saya mengatakan bahwa saya hanya setengah dan menempatkan saya di keranjang… “Kamu menangis? Ayo, lebih banyak menangis. ” Saya kemudian dijemput oleh macan kumbang hitam dengan kepribadian yang kejam. “Kamu kurang stamina. Aku akan memakanmu lusa, jadi teruslah berusaha.” Binatang buas ini. Menatap wajahku yang gemetar, mata macan kumbang hitam itu berkilauan. “Sepertinya aku hanya merasa senang.” Bu, saya pikir dia gila! Untuk bertahan hidup dari macan kumbang hitam yang cukup gila. "Binatang buas itu posesif, tidak peduli apa itu." ….Apa itu mungkin?

---

description.tr:
Benim adım Vivi Lapian. Ünlü Lapian ailesinin parçasıyım ve şekil değiştirebilen bir tavşanım. Şekil değiştirenler dünyasında herkes yetişkin olunca bir insana dönüşebilir. ama bir sebepten dolayı 18 yaşıma gelmeme rağmen bir türlü dönüşemedim. Varlığımın verdiği utanç yüzünden ailem beni kara panter bölgesine terk etti. Ve ben sanki kaderimde yazılmış gibi bana bir çift parlayan kızıl gözlerle bakan kara bir leopar ile karşılaştım~ “Yem olmaktan korkuyor musun? O zaman daha çok ağla.” “Bacakların kısa olduğu için şişko tavşan.” “Seni aldım. Bu yüzden artık bana aitsin.” Bu… bu normal değil~!!! Kara panterler yetmezmiş gibi bir de aslanlar ve kurtlar ortaya çıkmaya başladı. Onca yer varken yırtıcı yaratıkların toplanma yeri olmak zorunda mıydı? Benim gibi yavru bir tavşan hayatta kalabilecek mi?

菲菲·雷碧安是名门望族雷碧安家族的兔子兽人。在这个只要长大就能变换成人形的世界中，她到了十八岁都无法人形化。也许是因为以她为耻，她的父母将她扔到了黑豹的领地。但她却命运般地遇到了用红瞳望着她的黑豹。可是这黑豹他……他好像是个变态!!! 除了黑豹，还有狮子和狼群，偏偏是在这个只有猛兽居住的区域里，仍旧是个小兔子的菲菲，能生存下去吗？

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…
description.id: Meng Chuan menyaksikan ibunya terbunuh di depan matanya, jadi dia berlatih sangat keras berharap suatu hari bisa membalas kematiannya. Tapi hari-harinya yang damai hancur ketika pertunangan pernikahannya dibatalkan, sebuah invasi oleh pasukan asing, tempat perlindungan jatuh ke tangan musuh... Untuk melindungi orang-orang Kota Ning, ia mengambil pedangnya dan bersumpah untuk menjadi yang terkuat. Ini adalah tanggung jawab yang berat dan perjalanan yang panjang...

altTitles.ja: 炎のインフェルノ

description.en: Aflame Inferno is about a self absorbed high schooler, Kang Shichan, that gets caught in the middle of a battle between demons. Injured severely and near death, the demon Inferno merges with the student to save his life. Together they win the battle to discover that they are inescapably joined. The only hope of ever being separate beings is to gather 1,000 Invento Hells and find the right spell of Resurrection. Can Kang Shichan balance hunting down demons with his school work?
description.pl: Kang Shichan, bardzo zaabsorbowany życiem szkolnym uczeń, wpada wprost w bitwę między dwoma demonami i zostaje poważnie ranny. Jeden z diabelskich pomiotów, Inferno, który również jest u kresu swych sił, proponuje mu układ: chłopak przeżyje, jeśli użyczy demonowi miejsca w swoim ciele.

altTitles.ja: 転校生メデューサと二口ちゃん

altTitles.ja: こまえーきイチャイチャ漫画

title.en: Catherine's Key to a Happy Life

altTitles.en: Rejected Lady Enjoying a Modest Life
The Abandoned Bachelorette Enjoys Her Simple Life
A Delightful Simple Life of a Single, After Leaving Home

altTitles.es-la: La sencilla vida de soltería disfrutada después de ser abandonada

description.en:
Catherine did not want much.

Even if she did not have luxurious clothes and shoes, she was alright with her hideously frayed bedroom curtains and her shoes that were so worn at the soles it was different in height.

It had been two years since she started enduring it for the sake of her late mother.

She no longer felt the need to do that.

"Alright, I'll leave."

Catherine was tired of everything.

***

"Are you the Pope's watchdog? You've done well coming all the way here."

The man who intruded her home was drenched from head to toe.
She could see mud squished beneath his black leather boots.

Unbelievable.
To think he would drag in not grass, but mud, while she was cleaning the floors!

"You've got quite the disguise. Even I was almost fooled into thinking that you're just an ordinary city woman---"
"Wipe it."

She pushed the rag she held onto the man.

"Why are you looking at me so foolishly? I told you to wipe the floor. And it's not proper to show your sword when it's our first time meeting each other. Is it not enough that you intruded that you would want to be reported for attempted murder?"
description.pl:
Catherine nie chciała wiele. Nawet jeśli nie miała luksusowych ubrań i butów, odpowiadały jej ohydnie postrzępione zasłony w sypialni i szpilki, które były tak zużyte na podeszwach, że różniły się wysokością od zwykłych butów. Minęły dwa lata, odkąd zaczęła to znosić ze względu na swoją zmarłą matkę. Teraz nie czuła już takiej potrzeby. 
"W porządku, odejdę." 
Catherine była zmęczona wszystkim. 
*** 
Jesteś strażniczką papieża? Dobrze zrobiłaś, że tu przybyłaś". 
Mężczyzna, który wtargnął do jej domu, był przemoczony od stóp do głów. Pod jego czarnymi skórzanymi butami widać było błoto. 
Niewiarygodne. 
Pomyśleć, że wlókł nie trawę, ale błoto, podczas gdy ona czyściła podłogi! 
"Masz niezłe przebranie. Nawet ja dałem się nabrać, że jesteś zwykłą kobietą z miasta..." 
"Wytrzyj to." 
Pchnęła szmatę, którą trzymała, na mężczyznę. 
"Dlaczego patrzysz na mnie tak głupio? Kazałam ci wytrzeć podłogę. I nie wypada pokazywać miecza, gdy spotykamy się po raz pierwszy. Czy nie wystarczy już, że tu wtargnąłeś, że chcesz być jeszcze zgłoszony za usiłowanie zabójstwa?

title.en: Ore no [Kantei] Skill ga Cheat Sugite ~Densetsu no Yuusha wo Yomi "Tori" Saikyou e~

altTitles.ja: 俺の『鑑定』スキルがチートすぎて ～伝説の勇者を読み“盗り”最強へ～

altTitles.en: My [Appraisal] Skill Is Too Overpowered ~Reading and Stealing the Legendary Hero’s Skills to Become the Strongest~

description.en:
When Mel Rairoot, an orphaned boy, turned 15, he was given the unique skill of [Appraisal], which allows him to read information about people and objects. Moreover, it was an extraordinary skill that should not exist, surpassing even the legendary rank S... rank EX! 

However, since [Appraisal] can also read information about people, there is a risk that it will be targeted by criminals who want to hide their identities. Mel's life is immediately targeted, and although he somehow manages to fight back, he is now being pursued! 

Mel is forced to live on the run with Silphy, the princess of the elf country who has lost her memory, and Clara, a tiger girl. However, he makes full use of his cheat ability to brilliantly overcome many difficulties! With the "Eye of God" in his hands, the boy reads and steals the power of the legendary hero, and rises to the top!



[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7932dt/)
description.ja:
天涯孤独の少年メルが15歳になって授かった固有スキルは人や物の情報を読み取る『鑑定スキル』。しかも、幻のランク“S”をも超える、存在しないはずのランク“EX”だった！

“神の眼”を手にしたメルは、記憶を失くした幼なじみ・エルフの王女シルフィ、虎人族の少女クララとともに故郷を目指す旅に出る！

altTitles.ja: ガベージブレイブ
ガベージブレイブ 異世界に召喚され捨てられた勇者の復讐物語

description.en:
While on a regular school day, Tsukuru along with his classmates got transported to another world.  
  
However, at the other side of the summoning there was a hero's auction, where each nation would bid for the heroes to defeat the demon kings of each territories.  
  
While his classmates received cheat jobs and got auctioned quickly Tsukuru got the useless job "Chef," as no nation bid for him, he got thrown out through a transfer gate. At the other side of the gate was a territory dominated by strong monsters…  
  
As he manages to survive the monster's attacks while nearly dying, Tsukuru goes forward on the path of becoming the strongest!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2248el/)  


---
description.fr:
Un jour d'école normal, Tsukuru et ses camarades de classe sont transportés dans un autre monde.  
  
Ils se retrouvent… au beau milieu d’une vente aux enchères! Alors que ses camarades de classe, encore confus, sont rapidement mis aux enchères, Tsukuru découvre qu"il possède la classe "cuisinier." Aucune nation ne faisant d’offres, il est rapidement jeté dehors par une porte de transfert.  
  
De l'autre côté de cette porte se trouve un territoire dominé par de puissants monstres…  
  
Alors qu'il réussit tout juste à survivre aux attaques d’un monstre, Tsukuru décide d'avancer sur le chemin qui le rendra plus fort!

altTitles.ja: 異世界メタラー

description.en:
Alex, a devoted metalhead, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band’s breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble...

When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a metalhead’s dream, featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. 

Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey!
description.es: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. En medio de la tristeza, sufre un accidente eléctrico debido a problemas con el equipo... Cuando despierta, ¡descubre que ha sido transportado a otro mundo! En este nuevo mundo, Alex se encuentra con situaciones que son el «sueño de un metalero», con hombres lobo y dragones, que le excitan enormemente. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...
description.ja: メタルを深く愛するアレキは、バンドの解散ライブで悲しみに暮れる中、機材トラブルで感電事故に遭う……。そして目が覚めると異世界に転移していた！？ 異世界では、狼男、ドラゴンと『メタラーの夢』であるシチュエーションに次々遭遇し、興奮するアレキ。メタル魂で異世界を平和に導こうとするが……

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

altTitles.ja: レジェンド

description.en: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.
